name: One Night with Spong
description:
THIS IS A JOKE GAME!!!!!!!!!!!!!

"900 year old Spong Squormp wants people to go to his house and partake in a fun game he calls, "One Night with Spong" Whoever wins his game will be given 1.2M dollars in cash."

"And we just got word that some dumbass actually took the challenge, he's defo dead now lol."

(THIS IS A DEMO)

HOW 2 PLAY

When Spong with a puppet or gun pops up, click on him.

When wavy Spong pops up, put on the mask.

When troll Spong appears, hope for the best.
